text.0: streams of this potent one have flowed easily to the strainingcloth.
text.1: while he is cleansed he lifts his voice.
text.2: indu by pressers urged to speed bellowing out while beautified.
text.3: sends forth a very mighty sound.
text.4: pour on us soma with thy stream manconquering might which many crave.
text.6: hither hath pavamana flowed soma flowed hither in a stream.
text.7: to settle in the vats of wood.
text.8: to waters with the stones they drive thee tawnyhued most rich in sweets.
text.9: o indu to be indras drink.
text.10: for indra for the thunderer press the soma very rich in sweets.
